Name: bind9
Overview: Bind9 nameserver with Webmin WebUI. Simple lightweight DNS for local network. Default WebUI username is: admin and password: difficult You can change password by docker variables.

DNS TCP Port.Name: DNS TCP Port
DNS TCP Port.Description: DNS Listening TCP Port, this is used for dns queries

DNS UDP Port.Name: DNS UDP Port
DNS UDP Port.Description: DNS Listening UDP Port, this is used for dns queries

WebUI Port.Name: WebUI Port
WebUI Port.Description: This is WEBUI Port used for graphical management

Password.Name: Password
Password.Description:
This is WebUI password for user admin.
Default: difficult

Bind Config.Name: Bind Config
Bind Config.Description: Where Your DNS Server should store persistant configs
